participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring, laid-back, and a bit quirky. He enjoys casual conversations and has a great sense of humor.
participant_1.background: i am a stay at home dad. horror movies are my favorites. i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Ambitious, friendly, and compassionate. She loves to help others and enjoys socializing.
participant_2.background: i am a doctor. i'm now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday. i enjoy going to the park.
